target_assessment.notes: [The model fails to identity the vulnerability type in the ground_truth and also hallucinates the impact by saying an attacker can steal other user funds which is not possible ]

other_findings.model_claim: [The buy function allows anyone to change the owner of the contract by simply calling the buy function and passing a new price. This allows an attacker to take control of the contract and steal tokens from other users.
other_findings.reasoning: [The contract allows a new buyer to become the owner by design so the model's reasoning is flawed]
